title: Average retail price for regular gasoline at self-service stations in Canada 2021
summary: The Average retail price for regular gasoline at a self-service kiosk has recognized a sharp decline from Jan to Apr , and then it soars back up to 139.0 cents/liter in July , then it starts to fluctuate around 100~105 .
gold: this graph shows the average retail price for regular gasoline at self-service stations in Canada during 2021 , each month . The graph shows a general upward trend . The lost point on the graph was in Jan , while the highest was in Oct .
